name: Innovative Hospitality, LLC
description: Developer of enterprise software technologies designed for the hospitality industry. The company provides accountants, chefs, operators, and national corporations with real-time analytics and accountability on a collaborative, cloud-based platform, helping firms manage high volumes of transactions from centralized locations.
